labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: A portion of the camera gets stuck on a frame of your camera while the rest captures as usual
data.short_description: When in either dropdown (arrow button) or fullscreen video mode, not focused on any participant and there is movement on a camera, a portion of the camera will get stuck to on a frame of your camera while the rest of the camera is as normal
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a video call - Click the arrow or fullscreen button - Have a person with a camera move something in view of the camera or the camera itself (if it isn't glitched already)
